security_audit.summary: Pure prompt-based skill containing only templates and guidance documentation. No executable code, no file system access, no network operations, and no command execution capabilities. This skill provides project scaffolding instructions that the AI generates for users to apply manually.

content.user_title: Set up projects with ready-to-use templates
content.value_statement: Starting a new project requires research and configuration work. This skill generates complete project structures with best-practice configurations for popular frameworks, so developers can start coding immediately.
actual_capabilities: Generate project directory structures for web, API, CLI, and library projects
Create configuration files for TypeScript, Python, and Go projects
Set up linting and formatting with ESLint, Prettier, and Black
Configure testing frameworks like Vitest, Jest, and pytest
Add pre-commit hooks with Husky for quality enforcement
Initialize CI/CD workflows with GitHub Actions
limitations: Does not execute shell commands or create files directly on the user's system
Does not install dependencies - users must run commands manually
Does not modify existing projects - only generates new project templates
Supported frameworks are limited to those documented in the skill

output: ‚Ä¢ ESLint with TypeScript and React plugins

best_practices: Start with a clear project structure that separates concerns from the beginning.
Configure linting and formatting tools before writing any code.
Set up testing framework and CI/CD pipeline on day one.
anti_patterns: Skipping configuration setup and fixing issues later in the project.
Mixing business logic, routing, and data access in the same files.
Committing secrets or environment-specific configuration to version control.

faq.question: Which frameworks does this skill support?
faq.answer: React, Vue, Angular, Next.js, Svelte, Express, Fastify, Django, FastAPI, Flask, Go, Rust, React Native, Flutter, and Electron.

faq.question: Does this skill create actual files on my computer?
faq.answer: No. The skill generates templates and instructions. You must copy the generated code and run commands manually.

faq.question: Can I use this skill to set up a monorepo?
faq.answer: Yes. Templates for Turborepo, Nx, and Lerna monorepos are included with shared package configurations.

faq.question: Is my data safe when using this skill?
faq.answer: Yes. This skill contains only text templates. No data leaves your system and no files are accessed.

faq.question: How do I customize the generated templates?
faq.answer: Ask the skill to modify any aspect of the generated templates. You can adjust dependencies, configurations, and structure.

faq.question: How is this different from create-react-app or similar tools?
faq.answer: This skill provides complete custom configurations with best practices. It explains the setup rather than automating it away.
